entities.name: Atlantis Island
entities.definition: Large Atlantic Ocean island opposite Mediterranean mouth, remnant of Atlantic continent

evidence.quote: there once existed in the Atlantic Ocean, opposite the mouth of the Mediterranean Sea, a large island, which was the remnant of an Atlantic continent, and known to the ancient world as Atlantis

entities.name: Antediluvian World/Garden of Eden
entities.definition: True prehistoric world including Garden of Eden, Gardens of Hesperides, Elysian Fields, Olympos, Asgard

evidence.quote: it was the true Antediluvian world; the Garden of Eden; the Gardens of the Hesperides; the Elysian Fields; the Gardens of Alcinous; the Mesomphalos; the Olympos; the Asgard of the traditions of the ancient nations

entities.name: Atlantean Colonies
entities.definition: Civilized nations populating shores of Gulf of Mexico, Mississippi, Amazon, Mediterranean, Europe, Africa, Baltic, Black Sea, Caspian

evidence.quote: from whose overflowings the shores of the Gulf of Mexico, the Mississippi River, the Amazon, the Pacific coast of South America, the Mediterranean, the west coast of Europe and Africa, the Baltic, the Black Sea, and the Caspian were populated by civilized nations

entities.name: Atlantean Kings/Queens as Gods
entities.definition: Kings, queens, heroes of Atlantis remembered as gods and goddesses by Greeks, Phoenicians, Hindoos, Scandinavians

evidence.quote: the gods and goddesses of the ancient Greeks, the Phoenicians, the Hindoos, and the Scandinavians were simply the kings, queens, and heroes of Atlantis; and the acts attributed to them in mythology are a confused recollection of real historical events

entities.name: Bronze Age Technology Transmission
entities.definition: European Bronze Age implements and iron manufacturing originating from Atlantean technology

evidence.quote: the implements of the 'Bronze Age' of Europe were derived from Atlantis. The Atlanteans were also the first manufacturers of iron

entities.name: Atlantean Alphabet System
entities.definition: Original alphabet system transmitted to Phoenicians (European parent) and Mayas of Central America

evidence.quote: the Phoenician alphabet, parent of all the European alphabets, was derived from an Atlantis alphabet, which was also conveyed from Atlantis to the Mayas of Central America

entities.name: Aryan-Semitic Homeland
entities.definition: Original seat of Aryan/Indo-European family, Semitic peoples, possibly Turanian races

evidence.quote: Atlantis was the original seat of the Aryan or Indo-European family of nations, as well as of the Semitic peoples, and possibly also of the Turanian races

entities.name: Geological Catastrophe
entities.definition: Terrible convulsion of nature causing entire island to sink into ocean with nearly all inhabitants

evidence.quote: Atlantis perished in a terrible convulsion of nature, in which the whole island sunk into the ocean, with nearly all its inhabitants

entities.name: Deluge Legend Transmission
entities.definition: Few survivors escaping on ships/rafts carrying tidings of catastrophe to east and west nations

evidence.quote: a few persons escaped in ships and on rafts, and, carried to the nations east and west the tidings of the appalling catastrophe, which has survived to our own time in the Flood and Deluge legends

morphisms.statement: Donnelly asserts Atlantis populated and civilized shores of both Old and New Worlds through colonization

evidence.quote: it became, in the course of ages, a populous and mighty nation, from whose overflowings the shores... were populated by civilized nations

morphisms.statement: Donnelly claims Atlantean rulers transmitted advanced metallurgy as remembered divine knowledge

evidence.quote: the gods and goddesses... were simply the kings, queens, and heroes of Atlantis... the implements of the 'Bronze Age' of Europe were derived from Atlantis

morphisms.statement: Donnelly asserts original Atlantean racial groups transmitted alphabet systems to both hemispheres

evidence.quote: Atlantis was the original seat of the Aryan or Indo-European family... the Phoenician alphabet... was derived from an Atlantis alphabet... also conveyed... to the Mayas

morphisms.statement: Donnelly claims geological catastrophe caused survivor dispersal creating universal flood legends

evidence.quote: Atlantis perished in a terrible convulsion... a few persons escaped... carried to the nations east and west the tidings... which has survived... in the Flood and Deluge legends

morphisms.statement: Donnelly asserts prehistoric golden age generated mythological memories of divine rulers

evidence.quote: it was the true Antediluvian world... representing a universal memory of a great land... the gods and goddesses... were simply the kings, queens, and heroes of Atlantis

olog.name: Donnelly's Atlantis Diffusion Theory
axioms: Plato's Atlantis account represents veritable history not fable
Atlantic Ocean once contained large continental land mass
Advanced prehistoric civilization served as source for global cultures
Similar cultural elements across continents indicate common origin point
Geological catastrophes can destroy entire civilizations and create universal memories
rules: IF similar cultural elements appear on opposite sides of Atlantic THEN common Atlantean origin explains transmission
IF Bronze Age technology and alphabets show intercontinental resemblances THEN Atlantean diffusion accounts for spread
IF flood legends exist globally THEN survivors from Atlantean catastrophe carried these memories
IF mythological gods show historical patterns THEN they represent memories of actual Atlantean rulers

evidence.quote: If these propositions can be proved, they will solve many problems which now perplex mankind... they will explain the remarkable resemblances which exist between the ancient civilizations found upon the opposite shores of the Atlantic Ocean
it will only be by bringing to bear upon the question of Atlantis a thousand converging lines of light from a multitude of researches made by scholars in different fields of modern thought
There can be no question that Solon visited Egypt... There is no improbability in the statement that he commenced in verse a history and description of Atlantis
